ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Brighton and Sussex University Hospitals NHS Trust

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Brighton and Sussex University Hospitals NHS Trust
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Royal Sussex County Hospital, Eastern Road

TITLE.P: BS-02759 — Provision of Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate Analysers

SHORT_DESCR.P: Brighton and Sussex University Hospitals are tendering for a system to replace equipment within its haematology service provided at both laboratories. The successful vendor shall: supply, install, commission and maintain one (1) automatic erythrocyte sedimentation rate analyser for both sites. Provide reagents, QC materials, calibrators and associated consumables. Provide education and training. Support the laboratory in maintaining full accreditation with all relevant bodies.

Brighton and Sussex University Hospitals are tendering for a system to replace equipment within its haematology service provided at both laboratories. The successful vendor shall: supply, install, commission and maintain one (1) automatic erythrocyte sedimentation rate analyser for both sites. Provide reagents, QC materials, calibrators and associated consumables. Provide education and training. Support the laboratory in maintaining full accreditation with all relevant bodies.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: This is the procurement of capital equipment as well as a 5 years fixed service contract with the option to extend 1 x 12 month option followed by a further 1 x 12 month option.

INFO_ADD.P: Bidders required to register their expression of interest via https://www.lppsourcing.org/procontract/LPP/supplier.nsf

Please register in sufficient time to enable to register your expression of interest. If the ITT is not received by the closing date/time, your submission will not be considered. You will be able to access the ITT documents once you have expressed your interest in this tender.
